shortDescription: An issue was discovered on ASMAX AR-804gu 66.34.1 devices. There is Command Injection via the cgi-bin/script query string.
vulnerabilityName: veracomp asmax_ar-804gu_firmware Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
